Passion & Patience
During my undergraduate studies in architecture, I learned that passion and patience are the foundations of my design approach. Passion drives me to explore bold ideas, engage deeply with each project, and continuously pursue excellence. Patience allows me to embrace the iterative nature of design, refining my work through research, revision, and attention to detail. Together, they shape my understanding that meaningful architecture is created not only through vision, but also through careful and disciplined development.
